descriptionHtml:
Play as this movie star! He has a pretty awesome scar (if I do say so myself), and will look awesome after he gets some better armor.
=========================================================================================
INSTALLATION:
extract the ESS file to your: User/Documents/MyGames/Skyrim/Saves

and you\'re done!
============================================================================================
I hope you all enjoy this char I made, as I am new to making these characters, this is only my 3rd character.
Here is the link to my first character: King Leonidas http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6045

Please feel free to spread this file around, as I made it purely for enjoyment. no credit required if uploaded to a different site!
========================================================================================
Happy \"Reloading!\" ;D
-MorninJerky
author: MorninJerky
